p: NO levels in the liver and kidney tissues were determined using the protocol described by Miranda et al. (2001) in a medium containing 400 μL of 2% VCl 3 in 5% HCl, 200 mL of 0.1% N-(1-naphthyl) ethylenediamine dihydrochloride and 200 μL of 2% sulfanilamide (in 5% HCl). The reaction mixture was incubated at 37°C for 60 min, and nitrite levels (which correspond to estimated levels of NO) were determined spectrophotometrically at 540 nm, based on the reduction of nitrate to nitrite by VCl 3. NO levels were expressed in nanomoles of NO per milligram of protein.
